title: Iron thrownaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The iron thrownaxe is a thrownaxe made of iron. They can be wielded by players at any Ranged level. They can be bought from the Tribal Weapons Salesman in the Ranging Guild. Thrownaxes cannot be smithed.

The iron thrownaxe is a thrownaxe made of iron. They can be wielded by players at any Ranged level. They can be bought from the Tribal Weapons Salesman in the Ranging Guild. Thrownaxes cannot be smithed.

[[File:Iron thrownaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''iron thrownaxe''' is a [[thrownaxe]] made of [[iron equipment|iron]]. They can be wielded by players at any [[Ranged]] level. They can be bought from the [[Tribal Weapons Salesman]] in the [[Ranging Guild]]. Thrownaxes ''cannot'' be smithed.
